eligibility_gap_reasons: Low income compared to loan amount

roadmap.action: Set up a budget to ensure timely payments on all loans
roadmap.impact: Avoids further defaults and late payments

roadmap.action: Negotiate a payment plan with Barclays for the defaulted loan
roadmap.impact: Reduces the negative impact of the default

roadmap.action: Increase monthly income through a part-time job or side gig
Make an extra payment towards the late loan
roadmap.impact: Reduces outstanding debt and improves payment history

roadmap.action: Continue making timely payments on all loans
Review and dispute any inaccuracies on the credit report
roadmap.impact: Removes potential negative items from the report

roadmap.action: Increase savings to build an emergency fund
roadmap.impact: Provides financial stability and reduces reliance on credit

roadmap.action: Pay off any small outstanding debts
roadmap.impact: Improves credit utilization and reduces overall debt

roadmap.action: Continue to make timely payments and monitor credit score
Consider consolidating loans to reduce interest rates
roadmap.impact: Lowers monthly payments and improves cash flow

roadmap.action: Review financial goals and adjust budget accordingly
roadmap.impact: Ensures continued financial health and creditworthiness

roadmap.action: Reassess credit needs and apply for new credit if necessary

recommendation_priority: Pay down revolving credit to under 30%
Maintain on-time payments for next 6 months
Avoid applying for any new loans
ai_recommendations: Negotiate a payment plan with Barclays to address the defaulted loan
Make consistent, on-time payments for the late loan to improve payment history
Increase monthly income through additional work or side jobs to improve debt-to-income ratio
Avoid taking on new debt until existing loans are managed effectively
Consider credit counseling services to develop a personalized debt management plan
